import React, { useState } from "react"; const CreateProduct = () => { const valueInitial = { name: "", manufacturer: "", description: " ", color: "", price: 1, imageFileName: "", screen: "", processor: "", ram: 0, }; const [product, setProduct] = useState(valueInitial); const dataCapture = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setProduct({ ...product, [name]: value }); }; const dataSave = async(e)=>{ const newUser = { nombre:usuario.nombre, apellido:usuario.apellido, edad:usuario.edad, telefono:usuario.telefono, email:usuario.email, name: "", manufacturer: "", description: " ", color: "", price: 1, imageFileName: "", screen: "", processor: "", ram: 0, } await axios.post('http://localhost:4000/api/products', newUser) setProduct({...valueInitial}) } return (

Create Product

); }; export default CreateProduct;
